title: FS - T206 Upgrade Special with Greater Price Reduction
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: FS - T206 Upgrade Special with Greater Price Reduction
posts.post_content:
Recent upgrades free up these five little Monsters for your consideration.
All forms of payment accepted: check, money order, no fee paypal (or add 3% for regular Paypal)
All prices include shipping.

Jack Quinn with an American Beauty c Frame reverse BVG 2 - SOLD & SHIPPED.
Joe Lake with Ball Showing PSA 6MC - SOLD & SHIPPED
Kitty Bransfield with P150 reverse SGC 30 - SOLD & SHIPPED
James Westlake (Southern League) Piedmont Reverse SGC 10 - $27
Emil Batch with P350 reverse PSA 2 - $25

Or take the last two for $50.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10334/batch[/IMG]

Check them out above & below
Hey Frank, Joe Lake is a bargain at that price, pretty tough common....
If MN didn't have like 11000 Lakes...I'd be all over that Lake!!!

[quote name="ullmandds" post=1198012]If MN didn't have like 11000 Lakes...I'd be all over that Lake!!![/QUOTE]

Peter, there are 493 lakes in my county, Oneida, alone.  I need to get rid of one.....make that two I forgot about Westlake.

There are only 111 lakes in Ramsey County.  You should reconsider.

At present Westlake and Batch are available.

Quinn may still be available.

to add these cards to your collection?
